description: A Zelda game we're not completely burnt out on.

v0.9.3.description:
Fixes the following:
* A release no longer crashes the game
* You now know what items you get from Darmani, Mikau, and Pamela's father.
* (#94) You will no longer get a free Mirror Shield from Like Likes
* (#95) You are no longer locked out of Goron Racetrack when you don't have a Powder Keg, complete Medigoron's challenge, and start a new cycle
* (#96) Romani should now give the Epona's song check when you have Epona's song
* (#97) Pamela's father no longer crashes the game
* (#99) Goron Elder will not start the Lullaby Intro cutscene anymore
* (#102) You can now buy Powder Kegs from the Goron in Bomb Shop with shopsanity disabled

## Disclaimer

This randomizer is still under development in the beta phase but is considered stable for playing. You may encounter features that are not finished yet or errors. Be sure to check the Issues page and report anything you encounter there.
v0.9.3.title: MMRecompRando v0.9.3

v0.9.4.description:
Changelog:
* Fix Curiosity Shop Rupee Trade crash when not on `advanced` shopsanity
  - Rupee Trades were moved into `advanced` shopsanity in the previous release
* Add compatibility with [Modern Controller Overhaul](https://thunderstore.io/c/zelda-64-recompiled/p/tomtee/Modern_Controller_Overhaul/) and [Arrow Tweaks](https://thunderstore.io/c/zelda-64-recompiled/p/LoadingError404/Arrow_Tweaks/)
* Fix softlock when sending certain items by sanitizing item/player text
  - Replaces problematic characters with a ¿ (this may look strange in many cases)
* Fix Mikau's check (always spawns his grave to give the item)
* Won't despawn the Milk Road boulder when finishing the Powder Keg license
* Minor logic tweaks
  - All Zora Hall checks now require Zora Mask
  - "Graveyard Day 2 Iron Knuckle Chest" now requires Lens of Truth
  - Correct logic for "Woodfall Temple Moving Flower Platform Room Beehive SF"
  - Add logic to "Moon Trade All Masks" (whoops)
  - Tingle purchases are now more logical

## Disclaimer

This randomizer is still under development in the beta phase but is considered stable for playing. You may encounter features that are not finished yet or errors. Be sure to check the Issues page and report anything you encounter there.
v0.9.4.title: MMRecompRando v0.9.4

v0.9.5a.description:
_This is a minor release that only fixes the desync bug, which resent items after having a session open for long enough._ #152 

### We are still working on a bigger release, but it is not ready for the public. This release will not contain any extra "sanities" seen elsewhere.

Changelog:
* `apconnect.txt`
* Fix `skullsanity`'s ignore setting and Ocean Spider House reward. (#122) (#135)
* Add option to lower required Skulltula Tokens and Stray Fairies needed for their respective rewards.
* Add exports for other mods to utilize rando's functions.
* Add compatibility with [Modern Controller Overhaul](https://thunderstore.io/c/zelda-64-recompiled/p/tomtee/Modern_Controller_Overhaul/)/[Interface Helper](https://thunderstore.io/c/zelda-64-recompiled/p/tomtee/Interface_Helper/), [EZTR](https://thunderstore.io/c/zelda-64-recompiled/p/LT_Schmiddy/EZ_Text_Replacer_API/), and [Say Less](https://thunderstore.io/c/zelda-64-recompiled/p/Jazzkid/Say_Less/). (#144)
* Change Stray Fairy item.
* Cycle through trade items using `A` along with `L`.
* Disable Takkuri's ability to steal items.
* Adjust Marine Research Lab fish.
* Tingle is no longer grounded. (#140)
* Oath to Order check is only given in boss arenas. (#124)
* Adjust Solo Menu to account for apworld changes.
* Move Curiosity Shop Trades to a new option.
* Fix multiworld shopsanity price calculation. (#125)
* Account for multiworld player aliases.
* Completely rename and reformat logic/apworld.
  - This should fix most logical issues from the previous release.  (#132)
* Type "frog is king" in #majoras-mask in the ap discord server if you're reading this.
* ###### add secret new option

## Disclaimer

This randomizer is still under development in the beta phase but is considered stable for playing. You may encounter features that are not finished yet or errors. Be sure to check the Issues page and report anything you encounter there.
v0.9.5a.title: MMRecompRando v0.9.5a
